confirm.title: Delete Polymorpher
confirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete this polymorpher?

storeonactor.title: Store Polymorphers on Actor
storeonactor.hint: Store the polymorphers on the actor instead of the user by default.

enableautomations.title: Enable Automations
enableautomations.hint: Enable the polymorpher automation system on spellcast.

autoclose.title: Auto-Close
autoclose.hint: Automatically close the polymorpher window after summoning.

hidebutton.title: Hide Polymorpher Button
hidebutton.hint: Hide the polymorpher button on the character sheet.

restrictOwned.title: Only Owned Actors
restrictOwned.hint: Restrict the polymorpher list to only show owned polymorphers actors.

restrictOnlyGM.title: Only GM can see Polymorpher button
restrictOnlyGM.hint: Restrict the polymorpher list to GMs only

removeLabelSheetHeader.title: Remove label from sheet header button
removeLabelSheetHeader.hint: Remove label from sheet header button useful for small monitor, tablet

hudColumn.title: HUD Column
hudColumn.hint: Which HUD column to place the button in

hudTopBottom.title: HUD Top/Bottom
hudTopBottom.hint: Where to place the button in the column

hudEnable.title: Enable token HUD feature
hudEnable.hint: Avoid the rendering of the polymorpher manager for fast polymorphing when click on the hud button. All the entities with a 'default summon type' setted on the token/actor configuration, will let you avoid the rendering of the polymorpher manager, can be really useful for fast combat, there two options 'random' and 'ordered' you can't enable both.
